evidence.text: Defendant is enjoined from enforcing GPMC 6.46.350 (the park exclusion ordinance)
enjoined from enforcing GPMC 5.61.030 and GPMC 6.46.090 (the camping ordinances) without first giving a warning of at least 24 hours before enforcement
enjoined from enforcing GPMC 5.61.030 and GPMC 6.46.090 (the camping ordinances) without first giving a warning of at least 24 hours before enforcement
enjoined from enforcing GPMC 5.57.020(A) (criminal trespassing on city property related to parks)
enjoined from enforcing the anti-camping ordinances (GPMC §§ 6.46.030 and 6.46.090) “without first giving a person a warning of at least 24 hours before enforcement.”
